com.simplify.payments.exception

Class InvalidRequestException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.simplify.payments.exception.ApiException
          • com.simplify.payments.exception.InvalidRequestException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidRequestException
extends ApiException
    Thrown to indicate that an error occured processing an API request.
    See Also:
    ApiException, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InvalidRequestException.FieldError
      Class representing a single error on a field in a request sent to the API.

      • InvalidRequestException

        public InvalidRequestException(int status,
                       java.util.Map<? extends java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.Object> errorData)
        Constructs an InvalidRequestException with the specified status and error data.
        Parameters:
        status - the HTTP status code
        errorData - a map representing the error details returned by the API. The map is expected to contain String value for the key "reference" and a map containing the detailed error data for the key "key". This map in turn is expected to contain String values for the keys "code" and "message" and a list for the key "fieldErrors" with each entry containing error information for a particular field.
        See Also:
        ApiException, InvalidRequestException.FieldError

    • Method Detail

        a list of FieldError objects (may be empty).
